German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Wunder +‎ -bar. Akin to Dutch wonderbaar, Swedish underbar and Low German wunnerbor.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈvʊndɐˌbaːɐ̯/
  • audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

wunderbar (comparative wunderbarer, superlative am wunderbarsten)

  1. wonderful

Declension[edit]
